RecordOperationSpec.Name: Set Sponsorship Opportunity to Available record operation
RecordOperationSpec.Description: Used to update the Availability of a Sponsorship Opportunity to Available
RecordOperationSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPOperationImplementation.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_UPDATE_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY_TOAVAILABLE_RECORDOPERATION ( @ID uniqueidentifier, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier ) as begin --check deletion rules, if any
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
-- use the system generated delete routine to allow proper recording of the deleting agent update dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY set AVAILABILITYCODE = 0, CHANGEDBYID = @CHANGEAGENTID, DATECHANGED = getdate() where ID = @ID
return 0;
end
